snippet: “Mandy Greer: The Ecstatic Moment” is a multipart installation at the Hudson River Museum that includes textiles, photography, video, sound, found objects and dozens of items from the museum’s decorative arts collection.
abstract: Mandy Greer: The Ecstatic Moment, multipart installation at the Hudson River Museum in Yonkers, includes textiles, photography, video, sound, found objects and dozens of items from museum’s decorative arts collection (Metropolitan/Westchester).
